profile.title: IT Engineer
profile.description: Junior IT Engineer with a passion for web development, cloud technologies, data science and project management. My curriculum is marked by an insatiable curiosity for data mining, innovative solution design and effective project management. I'm motivated by a desire to learn and continually improve, seeking challenges that push me out of my comfort zone. My goal is to contribute to meaningful projects that have a positive impact on society.
